scripts.compile: npm run compile:es2015 && npm run compile:es5 && npm run compile:umd
scripts.compile:es2015: npm run ngc -- -p src/tsconfig-es2015.json && npm run rollup -- build/angular-i18next.js -o dist/angular-i18next.js -f es -m
scripts.compile:es5: npm run ngc -- -p src/tsconfig-es5.json && npm run rollup -- build/angular-i18next.js -o dist/angular-i18next.es5.js -f es -m
scripts.compile:umd: npm run ngc -- -p src/tsconfig-es5.json && npm run rollup -- build/angular-i18next.js -o dist/angular-i18next.umd.js -f umd --name angular-i18next -m
scripts.copy:assets: npm run cpy -- "**/*.*" "!**/*.js" "../dist" --parents --cwd=build && npm run cpy -- src/package.json dist && npm run cpy -- README.md dist && npm run cpy -- CHANGELOG.md dist
scripts.preversion: npm run precommit && npm run copy:assets
scripts.version: npm run changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && npx conventional-github-releaser -p angular
scripts.precommit: npm run clean:compile && npm run clean:tests && npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run copy:assets && npm run test
scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run test
scripts.clean:tests: npm run rimraf -- coverage && npm run rimraf -- "tests/**/*.+(js|js.map|d.ts|metadata.json)"
scripts.test: npm run clean:tests && karma start karma.conf.js
scripts.test:watch: npm run clean:tests && karma start karma.conf.debug.js
